hanzi-su-wiki:
輪

Значения

Круг, кольцо; колесо, обод; счётный суффикс для колес и цветов

Мнемоника

Работа колесника считалась сложной и требовала совокупных знаний 侖. Колеса арбы 車 вырезались из цельного куска дерева, должны были быть круглыми и хорошо совместимыми.

Варианты

轮
purpleculture_pinyin:
lún
wheel; disk; ring; steamship; to take turns; to rotate; by turn; classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
колесо; диск; звенеть; пароход; по очереди; вращать; по очереди; классификатор для больших круглых объектов: диск или повторяющиеся события: округление, поворот

heisig_chinese_memo: Someone stole all the wheels from the cars at the scrapbook convention.
heisig_constituent: wheel, car, post-it note, meeting, scrapbook, glass canopy, hood, flowers
Keyword_KANJIDIC: wheel, ring, circle, link, loop, counter for wheels and flowers
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: колесо, кольцо, круг, связь, петли, счетчик для колес и цветов
koohiiStory1: During a talk at the academic conference, speaker shows an introductory slide depicting the structure of car, and then moves on to the more narrow topic of wheels.
koohiiStory2: Someone stole all the wheels off the ladies´ cars at the scrapbook convention.
jp_example_words:
首輪(くびわ): necklace, choker
年輪(ねんりん): annual tree ring
輪(りん): counter for wheels and flowers
車輪(しゃりん): (car) wheel
輪(わ): ring, hoop, circle
指輪(ゆびわ): ring
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: For your car you use a hat, some ground and a bookshelf to build a new wheel. I mean, it's generally ring and loop shaped, so it should work, right?
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine this wheel you made out of a hat, some ground (presumably to keep it all together), and a bookshelf. You install it on your car and hope for the best. This is why you should buy wheels from professional wheel makers.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Your wheel is... generally ring (りん) shaped, so that's good.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: A ring-shaped wheel is better than nothing. Hopefully it will get you where you need to go.
Ru_Russian: круг, кольцо, колесо, счетчик для колёс и цветов
Ru_Meaning: wheel, ring, circle, link, loop, counter for wheels and flowers
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), ｜, 个 (китайский счётный суффикс), 冊 (том), 車 (автомобиль)
Ru_trainchinese:
lún: (сущ/глаг) колесо; делать что-то по очереди
lún: (графема/сч.слово) предмет в форме колеса; пароход; тур, раунд (счетное слово для спортивных мероприятий, игр, встреч и т.д.)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the thinking (侖) car (車) has wheels
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The lifeguard enjoys work but doesn't make much money and the wheels are falling off of his car.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " car " and " lun ", the original meaning is wheel. "Shuowen": "A wheel is spoken if there is spoke, and a wheel is spoken if there is no spoke. From the car, the sound of the sound." "Zhou Li‧ Kaogongji Preface": "Everyone who observes the car must be carried on the ground by itself, yes So the chariot starts from the wheel."

The craftsman who makes wheels can be represented by " wheels ". "Mencius-Teng Wen Gong 2": "If the son is like a master, then all the zi carpenters will have to eat in the son." Zhao Qi's note: "Wheel, Yuren, car maker."

" Wheel " can refer to a car. Song Sun Guangxian, "Linjiang Immortal": "Where will the chariot go, parting with sorrow and hate, it's a thousand unbearable."

" Wheel " can represent the horizontal branches of a tree. "Songs of the Chu-Huainan Hill "Recruiting Hermits"": "The trees and the trees are tangled together, and the trees are stubborn." Zhu Xi's notes: "Wheels, horizontal branches."

" Round " can also mean the wheel that winds up the fishing line, and it is also called " lun ". "Selected Works‧Pan Yue "Xizheng Fu"": "Watch the drums and cast the fishing nets." Li Shan's note: "The old saying goes: "Rounds, fishing wheels." It is said that it is a car to collect fishing rods. ."

" Wheel " also refers to the edge and periphery. "Southern History-Cao Wu Chuan": "The evening festival is in Yongzhou, and I will pay 70 million yuan to see you, all of which are thick and heavy."

" Wheel " also means turning and turning. "Lu Shichunqiu‧ Great Le": "The wheels of heaven and earth will return to beginning at the end, but they will revert to the extreme. It is not unreasonable." Gao You's note: "Round, turn."

" Round " also means taking turns and changing in turn. Jin Gehong's "The Legend of Immortals-Zhang Daoling": "Make all the disciples take rounds of rice silk, utensils, paper and pen, woodcutter and other things."

" Lun " can also be used as a quantifier. "Southern History·The Biography of the Thieves·Hou Jing": "Jing made various attacking tools and flying towers, wagons, climbing cars, castellated cars, terrace cars, trains, and they were several feet high. The cars reached twenty rounds, Chen Before Que, Hundred Dao attacked the city."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " car " and " lun ", the original meaning is wheel.
humanum_full_description:
從「車」，「侖」聲，本義為車輪。《說文》：「有輻曰輪，無輻曰輇。从車，侖聲。」《周禮‧考工記序》：「凡察車之道，必自載於地者始也，是故察車自輪始。」

　　製作車輪的工匠可用「輪」表示。《孟子‧滕文公下》：「子如通之，則梓匠輪輿皆得食於子。」趙岐注：「輪人、輿人，作車者。」

　　「輪」可代指車。宋孫光憲〈臨江仙〉：「杳杳征輪何處去，離愁別恨，千般不堪。」

　　「輪」可表示樹的橫枝。《楚辭‧淮南小山〈招隱士〉》：「樹輪相糾兮，林木茷骫。」朱熹集注：「輪，橫枝也。」

　　「輪」也可表示收捲釣線的轉輪，也作「綸」。《文選‧潘岳〈西征賦〉》：「徒觀其鼓枻迴輪，灑釣投網。」李善注：「舊說曰：『輪，釣輪也。』謂為車以收釣緡也。」

　　「輪」亦指邊緣、外圍。《南史‧曹武傳》：「晚節在雍州，致見錢七千萬，皆厚輪大郭。」

　　「輪」還表示回轉、轉動。《呂氏春秋‧大樂》：「天地車輪，終則復始，極則復反，莫不咸當。」高誘注：「輪，轉。」

　　「輪」亦表示輪流、依次更替。晉葛洪《神仙傳‧張道陵》：「使諸弟子隨事輪出米絹、器物、紙筆、樵薪什物等。」

　　「輪」還可用作量詞。《南史‧賊臣傳‧侯景》：「景造諸攻具及飛樓、橦車、登城車、鉤堞車、階道車、火車，並高數丈，車至二十輪，陳於闕前，百道攻城。」

轮轮 		wheel, revolve, turn, recur
  • invention 侖/仑 (thought out) of the wheel 車
 輸
(Simplified: 轮)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 侖 indicates the sound; 車 (wheel) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 車 [ chē ] cart, vehicle; to move in a cart
    • 侖 [ lún ] logical reasons, logical order
①安在車軸上可以轉動使車行進的圓形的東西(亦稱“車軲轆”)：輪子。車輪。輪胎。
②安在機器上能旋轉並促使機器動作的東西：齒輪兒。
③指“輪船”：江輪。拖輪。
④像車輪的：日輪。月輪(指圓月)。年輪。
⑤依次更替：輪班。輪訓。輪休。輪作。
⑥轉動：間或一輪。
⑦量詞：一輪紅日。頭輪影院。他比我大一輪。

從「 車 」，「 侖 」聲，本義為車輪。《說文》：「有輻曰輪，無輻曰輇。从車，侖聲。」《周禮‧考工記序》：「凡察車之道，必自載於地者始也，是故察車自輪始。」 製作車輪的工匠可用「 輪 」表示。《孟子‧滕文公下》：「子如通之，則梓匠輪輿皆得食於子。」趙岐注：「輪人、輿人，作車者。」 「 輪 」可代指車。宋孫光憲〈臨江仙〉：「杳杳征輪何處去，離愁別恨，千般不堪。」 「 輪 」可表示樹的橫枝。《楚辭‧淮南小山〈招隱士〉》：「樹輪相糾兮，林木茷骫。」朱熹集注：「輪，橫枝也。」 「 輪 」也可表示收捲釣線的轉輪，也作「 綸 」。《文選‧潘岳〈西征賦〉》：「徒觀其鼓枻迴輪，灑釣投網。」李善注：「舊說曰：『輪，釣輪也。』謂為車以收釣緡也。」 「 輪 」亦指邊緣、外圍。《南史‧曹武傳》：「晚節在雍州，致見錢七千萬，皆厚輪大郭。」 「 輪 」還表示回轉、轉動。《呂氏春秋‧大樂》：「天地車輪，終則復始，極則復反，莫不咸當。」高誘注：「輪，轉。」 「 輪 」亦表示輪流、依次更替。晉葛洪《神仙傳‧張道陵》：「使諸弟子隨事輪出米絹、器物、紙筆、樵薪什物等。」 「 輪 」還可用作量詞。《南史‧賊臣傳‧侯景》：「景造諸攻具及飛樓、橦車、登城車、鉤堞車、階道車、火車，並高數丈，車至二十輪，陳於闕前，百道攻城。」

"Zhou Li‧ Kaogongji Preface": "Everyone who observes the car must be carried on the ground by itself, yes So the chariot starts from the wheel." The craftsman who makes wheels can be represented by " wheels". "Mencius-Teng Wen Gong 2": "If the son is like a master, then all the zi carpenters will have to eat in the son." Zhao Qi's note: "Wheel, Yuren, car maker." " Wheel" can refer to a car. Song Sun Guangxian, "Linjiang Immortal": "Where will the chariot go, parting with sorrow and hate, it's a thousand unbearable." 輪字的基本解释

輪
lún
见“轮”。

輪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lún］
［《廣韻》力迍切，平諄，來。］
“轮1”的繁体字。
(1)车轮。
(2)指车牙。
(3)指车毂。
(4)代指车。
(5)收卷钓线的转轮。
(6)古代制作瓦瓶的圆形木模。
(7)古代的一种兵器。
(8)制作车轮的工匠。
(9)树的横枝。
(10)指月亮。
(11)兼指太阳。
(12)指人的头与四肢。
(13)轮船的省称。
(14)面积的纵度。
(15)高大貌。
(16)边缘，外围。
(17)回转；转动。
(18)轮流；依次更替。
(19)瞪着眼来回看。
(20)量词。辆。用以计车数。
(21)量词。多用于圆形之物，如日、月。
(22)量词。次；遍。用于循环的事物或动作。
(23)挥动。后作“掄”。
(24)姓。春秋齐国有轮扁。见《庄子·天道》。

輪字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　輪； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1245第20
【廣韻】力迍切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】龍春切，?音倫。【廣韻】車輪也。【說文】有輻曰輪，無輻曰輇。【釋名】輪，綸也。言瀰綸周匝也。【周禮·冬官考工記】察車自輪始。　又輪人，車官名。【周禮·冬官考工記】輪人爲輪。　又廣輪，地形縱橫也。【周禮·地官·大司徒】周知九州之地域廣輪之數。【註】東西爲廣，南北爲輪。　又大也。【禮·檀弓】美哉輪焉。【註】言輪囷高大也。　又【史記·鄒陽傳】輪囷離佹。【註】委曲盤戾也。　又輪轉，廻旋也。　又輪氏，地名。　又叶閭員切，音憐。【陸機·羽扇賦】夫創始者恆樸而飾，終者必姸。是故烹飪起于熱石，玉輅基于椎輪。　又叶良愼切，音吝。【王濬·平吳詩】馬怠其銜，車曳其輪。飛龍旣造，天命有晉。

輪字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

輪字的起名意思

暂无。

wheel
Basic explanation of words
wheel
lún
See "round".
wheel
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lún］
["Guangyun" forcefully cut, smooth, come. ]
Traditional characters for "轮1".
(1) Wheels.
(2) Refers to car teeth.
(3) Refers to the hub.
(4) Refers to the car.
(5) The reel for winding fishing line.
(6) The circular wooden mold for making clay vases in ancient times.
(7) An ancient weapon.
(8) Craftsmen who make wheels.
(9) The horizontal branches of the tree.
(10) Refers to the moon.
(11) Also refers to the sun.
(12) Refers to the head and limbs of a person.
(13) The provincial name of the ship.
(14) The verticality of the area.
(15) Tall and big.
(16) Edge, periphery.
(17) Rotation; rotation.
(18) Take turns; alternate in turn.
(19) Looking back and forth with staring eyes.
(20) Quantifiers. Vehicles. Used to count cars.
(21) Quantifiers. It is mostly used for round objects, such as the sun and the moon.
(22) Quantifiers. Times; times. Things or actions used in cycles.
(23) Waving. Later called "抡".
(24) Last name. In the Spring and Autumn Period, the Qi state-owned round of flat. See "Zhuangzi·The Way of Heaven".

Old glyph
wheel
Name meaning
Nothing.
lún
вм. 轮
Radicals: 車, 一, 冊  (car, ground, bookshelf, hat)
Meaning Mnemonic
For your car you use a hat, some ground and a bookshelf to build a new wheel. I mean, it's generally ring and loop shaped, so it should work, right?
Imagine this wheel you made out of a hat, some ground (presumably to keep it all together), and a bookshelf. You install it on your car and hope for the best. This is why you should buy wheels from professional wheel makers.
Reading Mnemonic
Your wheel is... generally ring (りん) shaped, so that's good.
A ring-shaped wheel is better than nothing. Hopefully it will get you where you need to go.
